H0.text: Ford Prefect came from a star in which constellation. Andromeda

H1.text: Ford Prefect came from a star in which constellation. Cassiopeia

H2.text: Ford Prefect came from a star in which constellation. Ursa Major

H3.text: Ford Prefect came from a star in which constellation. ORION

A4.text: Ford Prefect was from a small planet somewhere in the vicinity of Betelgeuse.
